div.a: Read More Tesfa Wins Academic Progress Award

article.class: post-3853 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-uncategorized has-post-thumbnail fallback-thumbnail

div.p: Tesfa will hold its bi-annual election for school board this May. 3 positions on the school board are open for reelection. According to Minnesota statute and Tesfa by-laws these positions will be separate ballots. One each for: (a) Teacher, (b) parent, and (c) community member. Voting for the election will be open from May 18, […]
